entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Pickle Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
